GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/reviews:review_id.description: serves an object of the specified review

GET /api/reviews:review_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given review_id

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: posts the comment in the request body at the specified review

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: updates the votes property of the specified review

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment containing the specified comment_id
